title: Oumar Pouye
text: Oumar Pouye (born 19 June 1988 in <a href="Niomre">Niomre</a>, <a href="Senegal">Senegal</a>) is a <a href="Senegal">Senegal</a>ese <a href="football%20%28soccer%29">football</a> <a href="midfielder">midfielder</a>. He currently plays for <a href="France">French</a> club <a href="Les%20Herbiers%20VF">Les Herbiers VF</a>.
